CustomField.formula: IF(pse__Calendar_Hours__c=0, 0, (pse__Calendar_Hours__c - pse__Assigned_Billable_Hours__c - pse__Assigned_Excluded_Hours__c - pse__Assigned_Credited_Hours__c - pse__Assigned_Non_Billable_Hours__c - pse__Held_Hours__c - pse__Unheld_Hours__c))
CustomField.label: Remaining Capacity Hours
